channel.title: Valdir Junior | System Engineer
channel.description: Recent content on Valdir Junior | System Engineer

item.description:
About Me

Hello! I’m Valdir Junior, a System Administrator with a passion for automation and cloud infrastructure.
I have experience with both Linux and Windows environments.

Here are some of my core skills:

  • Cloud Platforms (AWS, Azure)
  • Scripting (Bash, PowerShell)
  • Network Configuration

You can find more of my work on my GitHub profile.
You can also connect with me on LinkedIn.
